Avel de Knight (1923-1995) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe, ónyé nkụzi nka, na ónyé na-enyocha nka. Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke Metropolitan Museum of Art, Walker Art Center, na Mahadum Richmond Museums.
A mụrụ De Knight na New York. E nyèrè afọ a mụrụ ya dị ka 1921, 1923, 1925, 1931, na 1933. Nné na nnà ya si Barbados na Puerto Rico kwaga United States. Ọ bụ nwanne nwoke nke René DeKnight.
De Knight gụrụ nka na Pratt Institute site na 1941-1942
Ọ sonyeere ndị agha ma jee ozi n'otu òtù dị iche iche ruo mgbè Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ biri
N'afọ 1946, ọ kwagara Paris ebe o jiri G.I
Bill gaa École des Beaux-Arts, Académie de la Grande Chaumière, na Académie Julian.
De Knight na-ese ihe osise mmịrị ma na-emekarị usoro eserese gouache.
Ọ kụziri na Art Students League nkè New York na National Academy School of Fine Arts.
